1. Class has two types of variables class/static and instance variables 2. Methods are of three types in class 1. class 2. static 3.instance 3. Instance methods are of two types 1. accessors 2. mutators polymorphism: 4 ways of implementing polymorphism: 1. Duck Typing 2. Operator Overloading 3. Method Overloading 4. Method Overriding
